product_name: Cleanwaste WAG BAG Waste Bags - Package of 12
long_description: Refills for The PETTTM Portable Environmental Toilet, these single-use, zip-close Cleanwaste WAG BAG Toilet in a BagTM human waste bags can also be used separately for camping.
